result.execSummary:
The defendant Kirstin M. Feign was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Conditions:

Attend, pay for, and successfully complete any programming or education ordered by the agen.

Enroll in and successfully complete some form of anger management counseling.

Pay costs.  Agent to note that some of the costs have already been paid from the bond.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kirstin M. Feign

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Kirstin M. Feign in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Warrant quashed.  Atty. M states plea agreement - def to plead to count 1 for dismissal of count 2 and 20 days in jail beginning today.  Def pleads guilty.  Court's colloquy on plea.  Finding of guilty.  Court would prefer probation dispo to the proposed jail - orders sentence withheld for 1 year probation with conditions that def attend, pay for, and succ. complete any programming ordered by agent; def to be enrolled in some form of a.m. counseling.  Pay costs of the action.  Count 2 dismissed.  0 days credit.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 2, 2016 at 09:15 am.

4:05 p.m.  Attorney Lisa A McDougal in court for Defendant Kirstin M. Feign. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Kirstin M. Feign not in court.  Atty. McDougal has no information as to why def not here.  Warrant requested and ordered.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 13, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Kirstin M. Feign in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Counsel request setover to 7/13.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 13, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 15, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Kirstin M. Feign in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing requested and set.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 15, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Kirstin M. Feign in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Further status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for April 13, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Kirstin M. Feign
Current: 125 Schmitz St, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 01-14-2016)
Prior: 125 S. Schmitz Street, Richland Center, WI 53581
Correction on def's first name spelling:  Kristin, not Kristen as stated in the complaint

Defendant Kirsten M. Feign in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  NG entered.  Status requested.  Status conference scheduled for February 3, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Kirsten M. Feign in court without counsel. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Court states the charges and informs def of the possible max. penalties as well as her rights including right to counsel.  Court instructs def to contact SPD re eligibility.  Matter adjourned to  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 6, 2016 at 10:00 am.

(Def reports back to the Court after the hearing - has called SPD and is eligible.)
